metadata.synopsis: Steeps Evacuation: a family tries to get smuggled past the absolute ships and out of the city. They don't have enough cash so dad decides to stay and let mum and the kids leave first.This is the father, whose name is Dharin Brislen.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Go to -218;9;-158- Talk to the human male (father).

0.speaker: Dharin Brislen
0.text: I hate sending Leepak and the girls off without me, but if that smuggler can get them to Waterdeep and away from the Absolute...

1.speaker: Dharin Brislen
1.text: I don't know who you are, but all I can say is thank you. If you ever have children, you'll understand what you've done for us.
